CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Icon with link anchored by the Badge Type Name to the Badge Type assigned to the Contact.
CustomField.formula: IF(OrderApi__Badge_Type__c != null, OrderApi__Badge_Type__r.OrderApi__Icon__c, "Image Not Available") & " " & HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_410 , FIND('/services', $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_410)) & Id, OrderApi__Badge_Type__r.Name, "_tab")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Icon with link anchored by the Badge Type Name to the Badge Type assigned to the Contact.
CustomField.label: Badge
